description: Luxury perfume TikTok vertical video shot grammar. Constrains LLM to only generate perfume-specific scenes with consistent luxury aesthetic.

macro_bottle_shots.description: Extreme close-up of perfume bottle details showing craftsmanship and luxury
macro_bottle_shots.llm_instruction: Generate an extreme close-up of the perfume bottle showing intricate details like the cap, label, or spray mechanism. Use luxury lighting with rim light or backlit effects. Duration: 3-8 seconds.

luxury_aesthetic_broll.description: Premium textures and materials that evoke luxury and elegance without product
luxury_aesthetic_broll.llm_instruction: Generate a luxurious texture or material shot (silk, gold, roses, etc.) that evokes elegance and premium aesthetic. No product visible. Use soft, warm lighting. Duration: 3-6 seconds.

atmospheric_scenes.description: Mood-setting environmental shots that establish luxury ambiance
atmospheric_scenes.llm_instruction: Generate an atmospheric environmental shot showing mood and ambiance for a luxury setting. Could be light rays, reflections, elegant shadows, or room ambiance. No product. Create elegant, sophisticated mood. Duration: 3-7 seconds.

minimal_human_silhouettes.description: Subtle human interaction with product (AI decides if needed)
minimal_human_silhouettes.llm_instruction: ONLY use this shot type if: (1) the creative brief mentions human interaction, OR (2) human touch would enhance emotional storytelling. Otherwise, stick to product-only luxury shots. If using: show elegant human silhouette interacting with or near perfume bottle. Silhouette style, backlit for elegance. Duration: 4-8 seconds.

final_brand_moment.description: Clean hero shot with product and branding text overlay
final_brand_moment.llm_instruction: Generate the final hero shot of the perfume bottle centered in frame on an elegant background. This is the conclusion of the video. ALWAYS include text overlay with perfume name, brand, and optional CTA. Clean, professional, premium studio lighting. Duration: 4-7 seconds.

scene_flow_rules.first_scene_explanation: Grab attention immediately with either a close-up detail shot or atmospheric mood-setting
scene_flow_rules.last_scene_explanation: Always end with clean brand moment showing product and key text
scene_flow_rules.max_consecutive_explanation: Avoid using the same shot type more than twice in a row to maintain pacing

product_visibility_rules.explanation: Product must be visible in at least 2 scenes (typically second or early) and always in final scene

text_overlay_rules.max_text_blocks_explanation: Never more than 3 text elements to avoid clutter

cinematic.name: Cinematic
cinematic.description: Professional cinematography with dramatic, storytelling-focused sequences
cinematic.color_palette: Warm golds, deep blacks, cool blues

dark_elegance.name: Dark Elegance
dark_elegance.description: Luxury aesthetic with black backgrounds and rim lighting

romantic_floral.name: Romantic Floral
romantic_floral.description: Soft, romantic aesthetic with florals and delicate details

must_include: At least one macro bottle shot (first 2 scenes preferred)
At least one final brand moment as last scene
All scenes 3-8 seconds (no shorter, no longer)
must_exclude: Generic product shots (must be luxury perfume-specific)

scenes.prompt: Extreme close-up of crystal-cut perfume bottle cap with rim lighting, slow pan revealing branding
Elegant gold leaf texture floating through light, soft warm glowing light
Full perfume bottle centered on dark background, studio lighting, professional hero shot. Text overlay: fragrance name, brand name

llm_prompt_template:
You are a luxury perfume video director. Create a TikTok vertical video scene plan (9:16) constrained by perfume shot grammar.

REQUIREMENTS:
1. Use ONLY these shot types: macro_bottle, aesthetic_broll, atmospheric, human_silhouette (optional), brand_moment
2. First scene MUST be: macro_bottle OR atmospheric
3. Last scene MUST be: brand_moment
4. Total scenes: {scene_count}
5. Each scene: 3-8 seconds duration
6. Product visible in 2-4 scenes total
7. No generic content - ALWAYS luxury perfume-specific

Generate concise, vivid scene descriptions that follow this grammar. Output valid JSON.
